attributes.action: Demand the six British Veterans wrongly jailed in an Indian Prison are released.
attributes.additional_details: Please refer to The Sun article for further details on this story  https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/1807193/british-war-heroes-rotting-in-indian-prison-for-crimes-they-didnt-commit-beg-for-government-to-help-them/
attributes.background: We ask the British Government intervene in the immediate release for six British Veterans wrongly accused of trading weapons with Islamic militants.  Despite authorised paperwork for their duties, India have jailed them for five years with no supporting proof for their convictions.
